body:
Shiro looked much cuter as a kid.  He got RIDICULOUSLY tall as a teenager/adult. 

I don't like these shrine god stories in both yaoi and shoujo because it's predatory as hell. Helping out a little kid and holding them to their promise, only to fuck them a few years later isn't a good look.
@Regskawaii the picture you are using I have read that manga it's great

i already told myself not to go back on yaoi but here i am, squealing like a love struck teenager.... i guess it's just like what they say about BBC, except its yaoi hahhahaha. once you read yaoi, you can never go back hahahaahha
Azumi Kyohei please keep going on with this manga/story/henti!!!!!!!
L O V E!!!!!!!!! This so much I think this series is my new favorite 👍🏽
Cute story, but I'll add as well that this is better fit on mangago, not here.
Minus the mom, and stalking thing this story was candy sweet, and i enjoyed every moment. Great shit
ok yeah great story and all.. but why upload on a hentai site of all things? mangago, or ven myreadingmanga is perfectly for fine for this
Whoever added this story to this site, thank you! This a good series! Light on sex and some of the dialog can come off sounding weird, but a fun concept, I like it!
